affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 60 / 80 / 100 / 120
INT DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 1.6
cmb:
MANA COST: 70/70/70/70
COOLDOWN: 5/4/3/2
desc: Skywrath launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath's intelligence.
notes:
The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it. Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.
name: skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt

attrib:
SHOT RANGE: 1600
DAMAGE RADIUS: 200
DAMAGE: 60 / 120 / 180 / 240
SLOW DURATION: 4
SLOW: 30% / 35% / 40% / 45%
cmb:
MANA COST: 110/110/110/110
COOLDOWN: 20/18/16/14
desc: Skywrath sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
notes:
Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.
Damages creeps around the impact area.
Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
Concussive Shot cannot be disjointed.
name: skywrath_mage_concussive_shot

cmb:
MANA COST: 80/90/100/110
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Skywrath seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
notes: The magic resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
name: skywrath_mage_ancient_seal

attrib:
RADIUS: 170
DURATION: 2.2
DAMAGE: 600 / 1000 / 1400
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 20 / 10 / 0
cmb:
MANA COST: 350/575/800
COOLDOWN: 60/40/20
desc:
Skywrath uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
name: skywrath_mage_mystic_flare
